settings.subtitle: LASER LIGHT THERAPY
settings.title: HAIR FOLLICLE STIMULATION
settings.info: Low-level laser light therapy provides direct follicle stimulation and thus follicle strengthening and hair growth. This painless, in office procedure, done 2 – 3 times per week for 20 – 40 minutes, has also been shown to improve hair growth after transplantation as well as when performed alone.

settings.text:
• The hair follicles are stimulated
  • Results include softer, fuller, thicker and shinier hair
  • Hair strength and elasticity is increased
  • After just one treatment, the blood supply to the scalp is increased by 54%
  • In 85% of patients, laser light therapy stops their hair loss progression

settings.title: Who can benefit from having laser light hair therapy?
settings.description: Laser light hair therapy is beneficial to both men and women who are in the early stages of hair loss. THis treatment may be used alone, or in combination with another type of hair loss treatment.

settings.title: Is laser light hair therapy safe?
When will I be able to see results from treatment?
settings.description: Patients should start to notice that their hair loss progression has lessened after 5-6 treatments. It may take 10-12 treatments in order to see more optimal results.
